hero.title: Explore the world with
hero.subtitle: We offer you a smart, fast flight booking experience at the best global prices.
hero.destination_placeholder: Where do you want to go?

about.hero_description: We believe travel is a right for everyone; that's why we designed a booking system that ensures global safety standards with carefully planned economic packages.
about.safety_item_4: On-ground emergency support in every destination
about.iso_note: * We apply international safety standards ISO 31000
about.discount_note: Save up to 30% when booking 15 days in advance
about.feature_timing_desc: We stick to a strict schedule to ensure every minute of your trip is utilized.
about.feature_groups_desc: Economic packages for groups and families at competitive prices.
about.feature_destinations_desc: Our team visits destinations first to ensure quality and safety.
about.feature_transparency_desc: No hidden fees; the price you see is the price you pay.
about.banner_desc: Whether you are planning a short domestic trip or a transcontinental adventure, we guarantee the perfect balance between economic price and peace of mind.

form.title: Contact Us
form.desc: Leave us a message and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

info.support_desc: Our support team is available to answer your questions and help you anytime.

ecosystem.main_description: We bridge the gap between local comfort and global exploration through a seamless digital ecosystem designed for the modern traveler.
ecosystem.intl_desc: Explore the world without boundaries. Access thousands of international flights and luxury hotels with a single click.
ecosystem.local_desc: Discover the hidden gems of your country. Tailored local experiences with premium transport and stay options.
ecosystem.bridge_desc: Switch seamlessly between our local and international platforms. Your data, loyalty points, and preferences follow you everywhere.
ecosystem.why_main_title: More than just a booking platform, we are your travel companion.
ecosystem.why_feature1_desc: Your data and payments are encrypted with the highest global security standards.
ecosystem.why_feature2_desc: Book your flight or stay in less than 60 seconds with our optimized engine.
ecosystem.why_feature3_desc: We connect you to over 500 destinations worldwide with ease and comfort.

footer.description: Your first destination for organizing trips and booking tickets locally and internationally with the latest technologies and best prices.
footer.newsletter_desc: Get the latest offers and discounts directly to your inbox.

services.hero_title: Explore Your Next Destination with Ease
services.hero_desc: We connect you with the best transport and tourism trips in Egypt and the Arab world through smart, secure, and seamless booking platforms.
services.why_desc: We provide innovative technological solutions that make travel a comfortable experience, from booking your ticket to reaching your destination.

quality.title: Excellent Service
quality.desc: We partner with top-tier transport companies to ensure the highest levels of luxury and quality.

safety.title: Secure Booking
safety.desc: Your data and payments are protected by the highest international security standards.

time.title: Save Time
time.desc: No more waiting in lines; book your trip and ticket in less than a minute.

transport.title: Daily Intercity Trips
transport.desc: Book your bus tickets to all Egyptian governorates at the best prices with the latest fleet via the Ticket Hub platform.

tours.title: Local & International Tours
tours.desc: Plan your next adventure and explore the world's most beautiful destinations with our customized programs on TicketHub Tours.

tickets.title: Your Tickets, Always in Your Pocket
tickets.desc: An integrated electronic ticketing system that eliminates paper and ensures easy modification or cancellation.

services.cta_desc: Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, we are here to make your journey better.

portal.main_subtitle: اختر منصتك المفضلة وابدأ رحلتك سواء كانت داخل حدود الوطن أو حول العالم بكبسة زر واحدة.
portal.intl_desc: استكشف العالم، احجز رحلاتك الدولية، وبرامجك السياحية في أرقى الوجهات العالمية.
portal.local_desc: حجز سريع ومضمون للرحلات الداخلية بين المدن المصرية بأفضل الأسعار وأحدث الباصات.
